attributes.action: Show Live Premier League Football FTA
attributes.additional_details: Here we have to pay to watch our national game, which we invented. Where as we can go to any other country in europe and see any of the premier league games in the uk for free? There was a law that SKY could not have all the packages for the premier league so ESPN were awarded some of the packages therefore making us pay more money to see our game. Not everyone can afford this.
